website_summaries.verdict: Featuring an attractive price point and multiple protective layers, passwords and other private information are easily kept away from prying eyes.
pros: Visibility is limited to those using screen head-on
Filter also protects from UV and blue light
Can use either the glossy or matte side, with the matte side cutting extra glare
Easy to install, using included sticky strips, which won’t interfere with computer closing completely
cons: Filtered colors might not be as true for users doing graphic design
Some users feel tabs could be more adhesive

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRIVACY SCREEN
customer_reviews.text: A must for frequent travelers who like to work on planes. Don't understand how people work on planes exposing incredibly private and confidential information to totally random people. This is a great solution, see pictures of the same screen from the front and the side. Fits perfectly on the screen, you can barely see the stickers holding on the screen and for the price is a huge deal!
customer_reviews.author: Customer A

customer_reviews.title: Best Anti-Glare Protector I ever used.
customer_reviews.text: It has good anti-glare functionality as it described. People sitting next to you in a meeting can't perceive contents on your screen. In addition, it doesn't reduce much brightness, which is better than the other anti-glare protectors I used.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Great privacy screen for your computer. I have a touch screen laptop and was a little hesitant about getting it. But it still works great and keeps snooping eyes off of the screen. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Chanel Westmorelad

customer_reviews.title: Block those peeking eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and wanted something that would help block the view of others to see my laptop screen especially on a plane. It works perfectly! I installed it so that I can slide the screen on and off which is helpful when I DO want someone to see my screen.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Loayza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This matched my screen perfect. Good choice and keeps snoopers away!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product for laptop privacy
customer_reviews.text: Whether your taking a laptop on a plane or to Starbucks, this privacy screen is a great way to keep prying eyes away from your work.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS J.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work on Lenovo ThinkPad
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work on my laptop (Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Yoga). Take a look at the photo & video I provided and you'll see if I were seated on an airplane, the person sitting next to me could read my screen and probably even someone two seats to my left. Unfortunately, I have no confidence that this screen will reduce the likelihood someone can see what's on my screen.
customer_reviews.author: jelarv

customer_reviews.title: Made screen darker but no privacy benefit.
customer_reviews.text: Put it on and took it off. Does not offer any privacy and has diagonal lines that I assume are supposed to be part of the privacy but more of a distraction. The filter just makes the screen darker and offers no privacy from any angle except if you are on the other side of the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn C. Sojourner

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why the reviews for this one are so much better than the 3M
customer_reviews.text: The privacy provided by this filter is barely half of what you get with the 3M gold filter. Not sure why the reviews for this one are so much better than the 3M. A person sitting next to you on a plane has an unobstructed view of half of the screen and the other half is only mildly blurred. Definitely not suitable if you have private client data to protect or even if you just don't want colleagues in a meeting to see you checking your email. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jacko

customer_reviews.title: It's just okay. I guess it depends on your ...
customer_reviews.text: It's just okay. I guess it depends on your laptop or computer. Ours has a flat screen with no ridges and the tabs did not work. Had to use the self adhesive stickers which initially were ok, but slightly obstructed some of the view. A few weeks later, the screen started to slip off. Will not work for the long term. Further, i had to order the screen several times due to the strange sizes. Hope others have an easier time.
customer_reviews.author: ChariG

customer_reviews.title: Works for privacy purposes in public places
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this using the included double-sided tape. The tape pieces are visible on the screen edges. Since I've been moving the laptop around a lot, from backpack to desk, and vice-versa, there have been dust particles getting stuck between the screen and the laptop display... which is distracting on an already small screen. This will darken your display by at least 50%.
customer_reviews.author: Carmin

customer_reviews.title: Worse Attachment Design EVER
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated, two attachment options - don't waste your time on the first one.. my dog could design a better attachment system... Now I'm stuck with it permanently attached - and the likelihood of that failing is very high.. It may be the best seller, but there are lots of people stuck with a piece of crap!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job dimming my screen when viewed from angles but not from the front. I took a few steps directly back and was able to still see the screen clearly, which I expected since the item only darkens side views. Also, there is a little indent on the top that helps me take the screen on and off when I need to share my work with coworkers. Very happy with this purchase and think it's a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten used to this screen and should work fine. But it has taken some getting used to. I will definitely need to replace the adhesions. The sticky tapes provided keep falling off. Also, the width of the screen is wider than not only my notebook screen but the outer diameter. So a vertical mounting would not have worked without cutting the screen down in size. I think it works well as a privacy screen. But even looking directly into the screen, it makes the letters in type a little fuzzy.
customer_reviews.author: Andy H

customer_reviews.title: Great protection of listed angles, horrible glare = downfall
customer_reviews.text: The screen I purchased fit my laptop perfectly (14" for my HP 14"). It did a good job with privacy in terms of angle and I am extremely pleased with how low profile the stickies are to attach it to my screen (it was something I was very nervous about when buying my first privacy screen). The problem: I joked with my colleagues that the privacy screen is TOO effective because I cannot see my laptop screen due to strong glare from standard office overhead lights. I tried to work with it but eventually it was straining my eyes too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Blocks your screen from unwanted attention, easily removed if needed.
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I can work on a plane or train without nosy neighbors giving me the side eye. I opted to use the plastic glide rails (provided) so I could easily remove it for demos, but it comes with both the ability to remove and the ability to permanently attach. I did have to increase the brightness of the screen a bit. Note that it doesn’t block the screen from those directly behind you as in a classroom setting, but I bought it for the close quarters side view blocking capability any way. Several of my coworkers saw it and bought one also. I am quite happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: One Cauldron

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This "privacy" screen does NOT increase privacy AT ALL. I can still see my laptop screen just as easily as I could without the additional screen installed. From the side, above, below...I can still read everything on my screen. To make matters worth, this screen does not adhere to your laptop screen like a protective glass cover sticks to your cellphone screen. No no. To install this piece, you have to stick these clear plastic tabs on the FRAME AROUND your screen, and then the plastic sheet stays in place by sticking to the underside of the tabs. Very poor product, and at 30 bucks, pretty surprising.
customer_reviews.author: D-Train

customer_reviews.title: Save your time and money
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad however it doesn't cover the entire display and you have to be so far to the side for it tow work that it doesn't make sense. I travel quite a bit, and people behindyme or to the side (in a plane) can still make out what is on the screen. Nice screen protector though and the touch inputs still work.
customer_reviews.author: SAVJR

customer_reviews.title: great for reducing eyestrain
customer_reviews.text: This has made my long hours computer use much more bearable while working during the pandemic. My headaches from eyestrain have been cut down to almost none, whereas they had been daily prior to using this. I also love the privacy aspect for when we are back to fill capacity and I am working on confidential work with people nearby. The only con would be that it tints the computer strongly and I sometimes doubt my own view of colors and brightness.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: PRIVACY at last
customer_reviews.text: This privacy screen is the BEST and for the price you can't beat it. It is a perfect fit for my Dell Latitude E7470. I work in an "open" office and I hate always wondering who is looking at my screen. Now I feel like I can work in privacy even if others are right next to me. I was also super easy to install. I would recommend this to anyone who wants privacy when working.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M Condos

customer_reviews.title: Very good product but....
customer_reviews.text: this s a very good product at keeping privacy while maintaining clear sight of my screen. i have a DELL XPS 15.6" screen and it seems a tad small, doesn't completely cover the screen. I bought a 2nd one for a new DELL XPS computer and i'll see if this is maybe a bad cut or if it's small as well. Other than that the quality of material is high grade and only 4 stars due to the size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. On Latitude E5470
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to install the little plastic mounting pieces. I frequently work on the computer in airline clubs, airports, and airplanes. This provides privacy. If someone were behind me or seriously rubber necking to see what's on the screen, they might be able to see something. But if someone is that intent on seeing my stuff and doing nefarious stuff with it, they probably captured everything when I logged onto the spoofed wi-fi site they set up.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Dog

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't provide privacy in the middle seat of a plane
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily to have privacy while working on the plane. Sad to say, the viewing angle is pretty wide that if you were in the middle seat, both people next to you would still be able to see more or less everything you're working on. Totally defeats the purpose for me. I actually don't mind the side tabs that hold the screen protector in, and appreciated that it came with two sets. I've definitely seen privacy protectors that obscure outside of a very narrow viewing angle. Not sure what brand it was though, maybe 3M?
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Provides privacy but with a fuzzy screen
customer_reviews.text: After reading all these bad reviews on the 3M privacy screens, I went with Akamai Office Products screen which had better reviews. It does serve as a privacy screen and does a pretty good job blocking views. However.. the screen is somewhat fuzzy and I had to take it off and will only be using when I have to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best anti-glare on the market
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT! This is the best! I tried a few others which weren't worth it and almost thought I'd have to end up buying a whole new laptop with antiglare screen but now this product saved me from having to buy a whole new laptop, since this easily attachable (and easy detachable) cover makes it seem like my laptop was bought with an anti-glare screen. It doesn't reflect the window behind me at all anymore ANd everything is clear and able to be read when I use laptop. I highly recommend getting this one and don't wast time trying out others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best and most versatile screen I have found
customer_reviews.text: This screen is absolutely perfect for me! Since I bring my laptop to meetings and travel, I can apply or remove it with ease. The screen and its carrying case ALWAYS stays in my laptop bag. I LOVE that I can remove it when I’m working from home when I don’t need “privacy.” The no tape application is great for my touch screen laptop that flips into a tablet. The privacy angle is better than my iPhone screen (which was a VERY pleasant surprise). HIGHLY recommend and will be buying more for my company. Definitely 5+ stars!
customer_reviews.author: Electronics buff

customer_reviews.title: Good screen, impossible to get the tabs to work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my work computer to have privacy while in meeting but after many tried, I was unable to adhere the tabs to allow the screen to slide on and off. Tabs were not sticky enough and didn't leave enough room to fit the screen
customer_reviews.author: JMoney

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any business owner!!
customer_reviews.text: I own my own business and this is a must have for anyone who takes a laptop with them or for anyone who owns a business PERIOD!! I am able to work on customer documents and not have to worry about someone glaring at the screen trying to read what I am doing. It fits perfectly on my HP laptop 2 in 1. Very inexpensive gadget to have to keep the privacy of your customers and all personal data you are working on.
customer_reviews.author: JLM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! It fits perfectly and installation was a breeze. It's perfect to still see well if laptop is in front of you but someone next to you cannot. This was perfect for work, since I sometimes am looking at sensitive info when someone comes to my desk. Love it! Seems to be good, sturdy material too so I expect it to last
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hester

customer_reviews.title: Bump up the brightness and everything's good
customer_reviews.text: Although installing the plastic tabs was a little fiddly at first, the screen itself does a great job restricting the view angle on my laptop screen. Unlike other screens I've attempted to use in the past, this one keeps the screen looking clear to the main user, and turning up the brightness means the screen looks pretty much normal.
customer_reviews.author: ProjectJLN

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely but too many vertical lines
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely on the surface pro. However, cannot see the screen properly due to too many vertical lines which appear from every angle. In fact, it puts strain on your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great to use and installation isn’t too bad.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think I’d like these as much as I do. I thought “ugh, I have to cut them to make them the right size for my Thinkpad and have to place the stickers on to hold them. I was wrong. It’s actually pretty easy and taking them in and out if need be is easy. Great for flying and wanting to keep your content private.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter1968

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product with a perfect fit for widescreen 14' ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product with a perfect fit for widescreen 14' laptops. This is the first one I didn't need to perform any adaptation. Added to this, the film is really firm and keeps its format without bending or blobbing. Doesn't scratch easily and dust doesn't stick in its surface. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Returned it moments after installing it... I bought the right size, but just didn't care for the way the mounting strips attached to the computer; they hung over the edge of my screen and really interfered with the view. Just couldn't get past it. The other way to attach is to stick it right on the screen with adhesive tape, but you can see through the screen and the tape blocks the screen in the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard marks on screen
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this screen for 3 months now. The screen itself fits well but over the 3 month period I see annoying keyboard marks on the screen. I tried cleaning them but still see the marks which dont seem to disappear. I will update my review if the customer service gets back to me with a solution.
customer_reviews.author: VC

customer_reviews.title: Helpful customer service
customer_reviews.text: When I first applied it, I had a ton of bubbles. I contacted customer service on a Friday afternoon and they got back to me right away. The issue was static on the monitor and I was able to re-apply after a good alcohol wipe-down of my monitor. One comment: if your device is like mine (ASUS Chromebook Flip), and the glass is a seamless piece over both the screen and it's edges, order a bigger one than you need. I bought both the filter and the laptop at the same time and wish I waited to measure. That said, the product still works great and I hardly notice the adhesive pieces in the corners of my screen.
customer_reviews.author: C Nelson

customer_reviews.title: easy to attach, great fit, but dark
customer_reviews.text: Easy to attach and does a great job filtering from people standing to the sides. It does darken the screen quite a bit, more than I expected. I will give it a try for a bit, but may opt to try a different filter or only use this when in the open office. Perfect fit for the Lenovo X240. You do see the edges of the double sided tape on the screen (as expected).
customer_reviews.author: B. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but adhesive is lacking.
customer_reviews.text: The temporary mounting system that allows you to take off and put on the screen doesn't work as the adhesive stickers came off the first time that I used it. I haven't tried the permanent system yet. The matte side does a great job of cutting down the glare outside, which is where I needed it. At home I have my laptop hooked up to a larger screen. I may just prop the screen up instead of permanently mounting it.
customer_reviews.author: Rudi Bennet

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Using on surface pro 5. Adds privacy, removes glare. Easy to put on take off. Only con is reduced touch sensitivity. It still works but you have to press hard. But I bought it for privacy and rarely use touch on my surface.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. H.E. Pennypacker

customer_reviews.title: It would be great if it stayed put...
customer_reviews.text: It does what it does, the size is perfect and it really difficult to see what is on screen from different angles. But the product won't stay put. The stickers they provided don't can't hold the product up. The second option was a disaster too. The product it self is good but a ticking it in place is a hassle and a dirty work.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly, does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a consultant that often works at client site or travels, and this helps keep prying eyes off my screen. It makes the screen dark, so you need to boost your brightness accordingly, but after a while, you don't even notice it. The matte surface keeps the glare off. the glossy gold kind is more effective at blocking more (it uses the reflections to obscure the screen), but I didn't need that much...
customer_reviews.author: MJReader

customer_reviews.title: For me, too dark and blurry
customer_reviews.text: I tried it with my Asus Q504U. It may work better for your laptop but for me it made the screen was very dark and blurred the text. Pros: I like the silicone seal. I have to return though because it's so dark and blurry that it's unusable. Update: Even though the filter didn't work very well for me I'm updating my star-rating because of the attentiveness of the seller. They quickly handled my refund and did their best to make sure I had a good experience even though the product didn't work for me. Great job, guys.
customer_reviews.author: TSmithLXIX

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: If you have money to spend on useless products, go ahead and buy it. There is ZERO difference in regards to privacy with this screen applied or not even when fully dimmed. A total waste for privacy since it works at such a ridiculous angle that they see more of the screen edge then the actual screen. However, it does provide some protection for the screen which is why I'm keeping it. 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Walton

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Installation of the screen went as intended. The adhesives do hold the screen in place and of needed that do stay on when the screen is removed for others to view your screen. The reason I gave the adhesives 4 stars is because you can see the sorta, but eh. They are not noticable on dark backgrounds, only light ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Due to the nature of my job, I was needing a privacy screen on my laptop. I found this one and thought I'd try it. It was easy to install and it can be removed when you don't need it. You do have to dim your screen to get the best privacy out of it. With the screen brightness up a little all that can be seen is lights and darks which is good enough for me when someone is sitting next to me or walking by. This product will come in very handy when I'm in public working from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Bynum

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest privacy screen I have setup in a long time. I liked the two types of instructions. The film was easy to lift off and the screen definitely keeps wandering eyes away. Make sure your laptop screen is clean and then within a few minutes of starting you will have given yourself some nice protection from "onlookers".
customer_reviews.author: S. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny, high quality and great design!
customer_reviews.text: It took me forever to find this exact one and I'm so glad I figured it out! This is exactly what I wanted. It is not sticky but adheres beautifully without sightly tabs, clips, magnets, or sticky tape. Privacy protection as advertised. Comes with a nice mounting plate for when it's not in use and a durable folder to store it in. I planned to remove it when I'm not working but I might just leave it in since it looks so nice! The only feedback I have is that I wish it was clearer how each different style is applied. Thank you for such a high quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: No privacy benefits & minimal anti-glare
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for privacy while commuting to work, but this won't help at all. The screen is still highly visible from many angles if not on the absolute lowest brightness setting - nothing close to the 60 degrees advertised on the packaging. Disappointed in the endorsement from Wired magazine and would not recommend unless you want anti-glare or screen protection only - privacy is not a feature of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great screen, added privacy
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were good. It fit on the screen well, and does a good job of adding privacy. I like that there are two different installation options. Suggest measuring your screen before ordering, I have a 14" wide screen laptop so it fit perfectly within the frame. However, it is not a total block of the screen. If you're sitting next to the screen you can still tell I am using Outlook or Excel, you just definitely wouldn't be able to read any emails or charts at all.
customer_reviews.author: Essad

customer_reviews.title: Works well to protect unwanted people from viewing your scree.
customer_reviews.text: My old laptop had a slightly depressed screen so it was easier to insert the protector behind the tabs. My new computer has a flush screen with the frame, so there is no room to slide the protector behind the tabs so the only way to attaching it is with the sticky tabs. Not as functional, but still works.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Provides privacy, blocks harmful light and easy to place on screen
customer_reviews.text: I love this screen. I take my laptop to work and sit in front of other people. I hate when people stare at my screen. This provides perfect privacy. Also helps protect the eyes from the glare. Installation is easy and simple. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Simran Sd

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Effective
customer_reviews.text: This is cheaper than most of the alternatives I was looking through while searching online. Also, does work well for work/travel environments. I will say, it works best when used with roughly half of a monitor's max brightness. It keeps people from being able to see what I'm doing and more importantly, no one could ever decipher numbers/emails/etc with this screen on. Someone could probably tell what program I was in if they moved their head around enough, but for the price, it does what I wanted. I used the 5 adhesive tab method where I can slide the screen in and out if needed, and it does not bother me at all.
customer_reviews.author: M. Massey

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector is definitely protecting my screen and my privacy. I order two, one for my workplace and one for my personal laptop. The installation is easy as same as other products on the market. The unique of this product I can see is 60-degree angle view which give really large space for your privacy. I really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Thao

customer_reviews.title: Partial privacy
customer_reviews.text: The screen does not "black out" your monitor beyond the 30 degree angle on each side of center. Rather, it dims the view so a casual observer cannot read any text. However, they can clearly see if you are looking at a text document, a spreadsheet, a map, or your Facebook newsfeed. If you're looking for a privacy screen that totally blacks out your monitor off-axis, then look elsewhere. Otherwise, the Akamai privacy screen is fine if you want to prevent someone from reading the text on your laptop while sitting next to you in a meeting (but they'll know if you're web surfing or really taking notes).
customer_reviews.author: Fender Fan

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not as private as expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for purposes to be able to work in a shared open-office space and maintain privacy. The viewing angle with the screen is wider than what I expected, and I know that someone sitting next to me in my open-office space could see some of the content of my screen as I asked someone next to me with the privacy screen in use. Helps slightly, but is not the solution that I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose well (anti glare + anti blue light)
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector does what it's supposed to pretty well, and has significantly helped with eye strain. The reason I am giving it 4 stars is because: 1) The semi-circle hole in the screen protector is not needed and unappealing 2) The installation method #2 (for those without bezels) has the stickers visible on the screen protector. I had to redo it since the first time it contained bubbles, but the next time I did not squeeze the screen protector the screen. 3) A bit over-priced
customer_reviews.author: Hoda Youssef

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!! A perfect fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: As a new owner of an HP Spectre 13.3 . . . I have patiently waited for a security screen that fits to the exact specs of my laptop! I had ordered one from someone else earlier, but when it arrive it was way too big. So I was very pleased to find this one for my laptop. Perfect Fit Perfect Security Shield Perfect adhesion Easy to install - thank you
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl S.

customer_reviews.title: Not that great for privacy
customer_reviews.text: This screen works well for dimming the light emitted from my laptop screen which seems to be easier on my eyes, but that's all it's good for. While easy to install, it does not offer the privacy expected from a "privacy screen" which is disappointing. I've tested from multiple angles and distances, and the privacy is only about half of what I expected it should be. I'll be buying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: M W

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price, perfect fit for my Lenovo T460s
customer_reviews.text: This privacy screen does everything the more expensive options do and with the same great quality! I have had more expensive versions that do not provide as much privacy from varying angles. As a consultant, I work with clients across multiple industries, and often work with classified data or personal matters with my team. I needed a screen that could hold up to HIPAA standards, and this has been great!
customer_reviews.author: STL Redbird

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FIT XPS 13 inch 2in1 7390 LAPTOP
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT DELL XPS 13 INCH 2in1 7390 LAPTOP. IT IS LONG ON THE SIDES AND SHORT IN THE BOTTOM OF MY LAPTOP. PLEASE SEE PICTURES.
customer_reviews.author: LBRNY

customer_reviews.title: This appears almost matte like my original screen
customer_reviews.text: It's much clearer than the 3M PF series. Also there's a lot less glare. The PF series (on either side) was full of glare. This appears almost matte like my original screen. It does dim the screen considerably - in private environments, I'm maxed out on brightness and it's pretty good. The view angle seems to be wider than the 3M PF series too. but it's dark so still hard to see, and certainly can't read anything. Overall first impressions are very positive. Wasn't happy with the 3M PF - will try this out, but so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: snoopspecial

customer_reviews.title: Great image quality. Silicone seal makes it so easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Five Stars. Image quality is excellent with the screen on while doing its job to protect from wandering eyes nearby. The silicone seal is the best solution that I have seen for a privacy screen. Further the design and construction is the best I have found out of all the brands on Amazon. I'm really happy with this product and plan to use whenever I travel! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Atmac

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!!
customer_reviews.text: This was not a cheap item so it was so frustrating that it is near impossible to get it separated from its holder without destroying the screen protector. There were little to no directions. $45 down the drain on this one..
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I had hoped!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a screen that would allow me to see my laptop screen while sitting outside. After considerable searching I found this one and it's terrific. I like that I was able to order one that was exactly the perfect size for my laptop. The tint is just what I was hoping for and it is quite easy to apply to my screen. I truly couldn't be happier with this product and if you study product reviews the way I do, believe me when I say you'll be happy you ordered from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Thought I could get some privacy on an airplane. Nope. High brightness or low brightness, doesn’t matter. You need to be looking almost directly sideways for it to work - and at that point, a privacy screen isn’t needed anyway. Overpriced regardless - it’s just a plastic screen.
customer_reviews.author: Nolfred

customer_reviews.title: Excellent privacy and fit just as described
customer_reviews.text: This privacy screen was exactly as described and fit perfectly with my Lenovo laptop. Excellent privacy in that screen can only be seen my user sitting straight on in front of the screen. What's on the screen is not visible to those sitting next to or behind the person with the laptop. I put this on my work laptop and now can work comfortably during my airplane travels and am assured no one can view the confidential information on my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Never remove it
customer_reviews.text: This screen is advertised as removable and even comes with the storage sleeve. Once removed, dirt will stick to the adhesive part and virtually impossible to clean. Works well if you do not intend to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: GV

customer_reviews.title: do not buy for privacy purposes
customer_reviews.text: This screen "protector" allows for wide angle of views. It allows others to view the screen from different angles. Depending on the angle, the letters maybe slightly blurry or tinted but the screen can still be viewed. If you buy this product, know you will be using it as a screen protector in the sense that someone won't physically damage your screen. it does not proectector your privacy, however.
customer_reviews.author: msniemi

customer_reviews.title: Really works reducing glare and Has great readbility
customer_reviews.text: I do work online and wanted to reduce eyestrain with a screen that also kept the readability strong. It was shipped quickly and was easy to install. I have a border-less monitor so used the tabs to secure the screen. This laptop has a touchscreen but I mainly use a mouse so I was not expecting to be able to use the touch function with the screen, but it works perfectly. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: It does NOT block as well as I would like. I got it for work because I face away from the door...and everyone can still see what website i'm on.... I've seen much better products, I just don't know which ones they are!!! I attached it my laptop and my fiance threw away the packaging OR I WOULD RETURN IT. Buy a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Regrets

customer_reviews.title: Excellent privacy, more glare than I'd like
customer_reviews.text: This privacy filter fits perfectly with the described dimensions. The gold color dims the head on view less than similar black filters. The screen angle is fantastic, someone sitting right next to me at a table or on an airplane is unable to see the screen, and the gold block-out color is cool. View from directly behind me is not obscured, but I wouldn't expect it to be with this type of product. My only negative is that the surface is very shiny and in some lighting conditions can make the screen very difficult to view for the primary user.
customer_reviews.author: Janessa W.

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE- do not buy
customer_reviews.text: So I have a Lenovo Yoga. The entire screen is one flat piece of glass. So this screen cover came with sticky tabs to put on the screen AND plastic sticky things to help HOLD UP the screen. NEITHER WORK. I cleaned screen with alcohol wipe. Let dry, applied all thingies and put screen on. Within 10 MINS the screen feel off. WASTE OF MONEY. I have used screen security on every laptop I have owned- NEVER had this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Price - XPS 13 9365
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my XPS 13 9365 (Touchscreen). :) Screen is quality and very dark :( Getting the product off the board it is attached to = nearly impossible :( On my XPS it is slightly too big - corners at the top go past laptop :( doesn't account for "border" around screen = corners lifted and impossible to click anything in the top corners (i.e. minimize, close, file, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Annabeth Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The privacy screen silicone attachment worked wonderfully and fit my edge-to-edge laptop perfectly. I was able to remove it and reattach it with no problem. However, the only downside that I noticed was that it make my laptop screen a little blurrier, so I chose not to use it unless I have to. I emailed the company asking if they had any alternative products I could use, and they responded very fast and offered to send me a different privacy screen for free. The other product didn't work with my laptop and they immediately gave me a full refund for my original purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Privacy Screen
customer_reviews.text: Awesome screen, fits perfect. I’m not a fan of people looking at my screen as I do work, or just browse. As a student and mom of four, trust me it works lol. It has a couple different ways to put it on as well, you can stick it on if you choose not to remove it, or the option to slide it on and off easily. Both adhesives work awesome. And won’t damage the material.
customer_reviews.author: Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Full refund issued due to filter not working on my laptop
customer_reviews.text: I had issues with this filter and my computer model, however customer service reached out and offered a full refund as well as additional adhesives. I am very impressed with their company valuing the customer satisfaction over their product. I will definitely consider buying other products from them in the future with my other devices!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel22

customer_reviews.title: Total Black Out
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Lenovo T460 screen perfectly and is fully blacked out at a 60 degree or greater angle, this means no one on either side of you can see what your doing. Office snoops that used to spy on me are upset that they can no longer see what I am doing, so this really works.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really provide any privacy.
customer_reviews.text: The description says only 60 degree viewing area. But you can pretty much see everything on the screen withing a 135 degree viewing area. I don't know how good or bad the other brands are, but this one isn't very good. If I had bought it at a store I would have taken it back. But I don't care enough about it to have to rebox it and take it to a UPS store. It just went straight into the trash. Product is of no value.
customer_reviews.author: B Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit, gives the desired privacy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm only a couple days in, but so far the product is as expected. I got this for my Dell laptop that I use for work; it's nice to be able to pull out your laptop in a room full of people and not have to worry about who's snooping. Also, I received an email from Akami giving me installation instructions, which is a nice touch. If this review isn't updated you can know that the product is still working well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation...hardly any privacy.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy, however the product does not give you complete privacy from the sides. You can still see what is on the monitor if you are standing at an angle or sides. I was expecting complete darkness from the sides as with my other privacy screens (from another brand). I'd recommend spending a few more bucks for a brand name privacy screen that will actually work and avoid this product. I will not be buying from screens from here in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Carrera

customer_reviews.title: On/Off Tabs fall right off
customer_reviews.text: Laptop Dell Latitude E5250. I wanted to use the tabs that should allow the privacy screen to slide in and out. The problem is that the tabs are completely flat which means when trying to slide the screen under the tabs, the tabs come right off. The adhesive does not adhere to the glass screen well enough. I am very disappointed in this product and would not recommend for use if you are wanting to be able to slide the privacy screen on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Instructions
customer_reviews.text: The instructions do not properly explain how to remove the filter from the plastic base. I tried peeling it off an ruined the edges of the filter. The installation video shows the filter popping off the plastic base simply which was not my experience. I actually had to bend the plastic almost in half before I could free a corner to remove the filter. After the initial removal I did find the filter became easier to remove from the plastic when stored.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price vs quality is on par when in comparison to 3M
customer_reviews.text: I've worked with dozens of privacy screens, and this one compares relatively well to the 3M ones. The privacy effect at exaggerated angles isn't quite as dark as the 3M products, but this is still a good option on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Works great for edge to edge touch screen laptops
customer_reviews.text: The product is designed for edge to edge touchscreen laptops. The privacy screen fits well. It works great and I think is the only solution available in the market. As you have noticed this screen sticks to the computer and I’m not sure how many times I can remove and reuse it. Also I think there should be a better instruction card. So that’s the reason I took off one Star.
customer_reviews.author: R Singh

customer_reviews.title: Good product, fulfills the purpose and good price
customer_reviews.text: Good privacy screen when compared to the cost. The attachment works well but is a bit clumsy and quite visible (difficult to avoid) but I will be using only the small corner fixers. When using the screen you can see the vertical lines in the material slightly disturbing your view of the laptop screen. Think it might be even more visible on my screen as I use a quite high resolution on my laptop screen. But overall I'm happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jesper HP

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Used on my 17 inch HP Spectre. Perfect fit. Eliminates viewing from angles. Test drove on two airplane flights. Would purchase again. Excellent follow up from seller to confirm happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. It looks great on my laptop. The touch screen still works. Product is easy to remove from the laptop. It is a little tricky to remove the screen from the mounting plate initially. I flexed the mounting plate in the corner to be sure I removed the screen properly with the black silicone seal border. I had to contact Akamai, and they were very responsive and super helpful. I will buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: buy4love

customer_reviews.title: 2 starts for install
customer_reviews.text: You have to use double sided tape for this to work, you can see all the tape through the screen which is super irritating for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, easy to put on.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, easy to put on, great case to keep it in when not in use. Privacy effectiveness is average. On planes at night and the cabin is dark have to turn screen brightness down to maintain privacy. Same as I have done with other screens. Seem high quality. I wojld definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny P

customer_reviews.title: not very private
customer_reviews.text: The screen fit my laptop perfectly, but it does not provide any privacy for the screen... you can still see the screen content from any angle. I will be purchasing from another source. Not recommended to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kristel C.

customer_reviews.title: it just has some wavy lines in the display that you get used to pretty quickly (I am using it now and have easily ...
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly and works as desired, it just has some wavy lines in the display that you get used to pretty quickly (I am using it now and have easily become accustomed to it - had to remember the lines were there to notice them). The privacy is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas4321

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend Privacy is EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: As a highly critical Amazon consumer, this privacy screen is EXACTLY what I was looking for. Fits perfectly on my laptop and can’t be viewed by the person sitting next to me on the plane couch or office. Appears to be durable high quality material. Second best part is that it literally takes minutes to apply. Loved that there were two installation options with extra application pieces. Visibility is perfect and now all I have to worry about is answering “why are you looking at a blank screen” ;) Also FYI I have a very thin HP Spectre and had no issues when closing the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Electronics buff

customer_reviews.title: It works for me! I used the double sided ...
customer_reviews.text: It works for me! I used the double sided tape to install it I don't intend to remove the privacy film anyway. Prying eyes can still see that your screen is on but couldn't make any out of it directly over your shoulder.. If you need a total privacy turn off your laptop.
customer_reviews.author: JQ

customer_reviews.title: especially larger fonts like presentations and graphs
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what I was hoping for but it works OK. The person sitting next to you can still see some things, especially larger fonts like presentations and graphs. Also, the notch on the upper right is a bit annoying. Finally, the glue on the double sided tape is visible since you have the bright light from the monitor behind it. Overall, it works but I've seen better.
customer_reviews.author: Berman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect just buy it
customer_reviews.text: I really love it it’s exactly as described make sure it’s the exact measurements to your laptops screen and it will fit like a glove. Very happy with this purchase I really needed this
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected, 2.5 stars?
customer_reviews.text: The product was advertised for a 13.3 laptop and that is exactly what I have, but when I opened it I quickly realized that it looks so wrong. It doesn't cover the whole screen, there is a half an inch gap that is not covered. The instructions to put it on if you don't want the adhesive straight in the screen are so confusing I just put the adhesive in the screen, and one of them keeps coming off. To be honest, I am disappointed because I opened (which destroyed the package) so I don't think I can return it.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: This screen is fantastic - absolutely great coverage, easy to apply and exactly what I was looking for. One of the questions answered said that it wouldn't work with a touch screen, but it does with this one. I don't typically USE the touch screen, but I still can if I want. Researched for a month before buying and kept coming back to this one. I did GOOD!
customer_reviews.author: CarolB

customer_reviews.title: — The screen itself is of very high quality and works great, but it stopped adhering to my laptop after ...
customer_reviews.text: -Update- The customer service department kindly reached out to rectify my issues with the product. I would gladly purchase from the seller again for this reason alone. — The screen itself is of very high quality and works great, but it stopped adhering to my laptop after only one week of use. The adhesive tabs provided did not work very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Reema shah

customer_reviews.title: Over priced, but good quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price point, I thought this was coming in a pack of at least 2. It’s just one screen in the box. However, it’s a really good product and I’m satisfied with what I have. It provides great level of screen privacy, and does not obscure the screen at all from a direct angle. It does exactly what I need it to
customer_reviews.author: Evan Nicely

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, great seller
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was told by her university that the students must have one of these so when taking exams there is no looking over by anyone. She found this product online and I purchased it. Not only does it fit very well, she had a concern and on a weekend day got a return email within one hour. That's excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

product_meta.title: 14" Akamai Computer Privacy Screen (16:9) - Black Security Shield - Laptop Monitor Protector - UV and Blue Light Filter
feature_bullets: LEAVE VISUAL HACKERS IN THE DARK: Don't expose your personal or business data to prying eyes in the office & during travel. Our 14 inch (widescreen) filter turns screens black when viewed from the side, while allowing crystal clear vision for you.

NOTE FOR OWNERS OF LAPTOPS WITH 14.0" EDGE-TO-EDGE GLASS DISPLAYS: Akamai now offers an easy-on, easy-off glass screen privacy protector. We're the sole designer & maker of this innovative privacy protector. Simply search for item number B0777Q5D78.

2 EASY INSTALLATION OPTIONS: It's a snap to apply your Akamai privacy screen. Choose between premium 3M adhesive strips or slide mount tabs. Both included applications are easily removable. They work great with all monitors - touchscreens included!

BLUE LIGHT & ANTI-GLARE EYE PROTECTION: Not only will your Akamai filter protect your login and other data from prying eyes, it reduces harmful blue light by 70%. And its 9H hardness rating also provides a layer of physical protection to your screen.

100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: Akamai is the leading computer screen privacy film producer, so we're happy to provide a no-questions-asked money back guarantee on your purchase. We're proud to make the best. Choose Akamai with complete buyer confidence!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,250 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
